text.autoconfig.particlemoths.title: Particle Moths Config
text.autoconfig.particlemoths.option.glo:
The Moths (particles) will be forced to always
be full brightness.
text.autoconfig.particlemoths.option.mov:
If set to true, the velocity for each axis will
be set based on the values below. If set to
false, all of the velocities will be set based
on the 'X Velocity' value.
text.autoconfig.particlemoths.option.mot:
Increasing this value will directly increase
the amount of moths that spawn.
text.autoconfig.particlemoths.option.spa:
Increasing this value will increase the *chance*
that moths will spawn. Even though it only
increases the chance, you will see a quite
obvious increase of moths.
